comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: Your telegram username is not found, you may want to fix it, I'm interested in the mods job.@Igebotz

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I know some professional moderators who are working on a couple of projects. It's better to add more details to the post about your project. And how are you going to pay as well, because only Bitcoin payment service would post here. If payment is in altcoin or token you have to move it altcoin service section. If need to DM me on Telegram, I can't DM you first, be careful from scammers.
